summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 31, Loch Gilvra Addition, being the alley from 41st Avenue North to East Newton Street, between 41st Avenue North and 42nd Avenue North; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 110529 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment of said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by mode of "Payment by Bonds".
